sentences.en: A formal contract is signed which is renewable annually.
sentences.cn: 正式签订了每年可续签的合同。

sentences.en: Alkali lignin is an abundant, cheap and renewable resource.
sentences.cn: 碱木素是一种来源丰富 、 价格低廉的可再生资源.

sentences.en: an industry based on renewable resources
sentences.cn: 基于可再生资源的行业

sentences.en: Diversity is a hallmark of the renewable energy development.
sentences.cn: 再生能源发展的特点是多元化.

sentences.en: Electricity companies pay a premium for renewable energy.
sentences.cn: 电力公司为可再生能源支付额外的费用.

sentences.en: It’s a six-month lease but it’s renewable.
sentences.cn: 租期六个月，但是可以续签。

sentences.en: Miscanthus for Renewable Energy Generation: European Union Experience and Projections for Illinois.
sentences.cn: 对可再生能量产生的错误看法: 欧洲联合试验和伊利诺斯州课题.

sentences.en: New systems must maximize the role of ecological mechanisms and emphasize the use of renewable resources.
sentences.cn: 新的系统应发挥生态机制的作用并重视可更新资源的利用.

sentences.en: Renewable energy has come of age.
sentences.cn: 可再生能源已发展成熟.
可再生能源并非灵丹妙药.

sentences.en: renewable energy such as solar power
Renewable sources of energy must be used where practical.
sentences.cn: 必须在可行的地方使用可再生能源。

sentences.en: The law of renewable energy was put into operation from this year.
sentences.cn: 可再生能源法规已于今年起生效.

sentences.en: The success of wind power represents a litmus test for renewable energy.
sentences.cn: 风能作为动力的成功是对可再生能源一次立见分晓的检验。

sentences.en: The village obtains all its energy from renewable sources.
sentences.cn: 这个村子完全利用可再生能源.

sentences.en: The world is turning to renewable energy resources.
sentences.cn: 世界正转向开发可再生能源.

sentences.en: Though water is a renewable resource, we should still economize.
sentences.cn: 水虽然是可再生资源, 但我们仍然需要节约使用.

words.tran_cn: 更新，恢复；复兴；补充；革新；续借；重申
可再生的；可更新的；可继续的

trans.tran_cn: 可继续的，可续订的，可更新的，可再生的，可翻新的
trans.tran_en: if an agreement or official document is renewable, you can make it continue for a further period of time after it ends
